profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.12 Implementation limits - page boundaries
profile.description: The size of any of the page boundaries described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.11.2 shall not be less than 3 units in either direction, nor shall it be greater than 14 400 units in either direction.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The size of any of the page boundaries described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.11.2 shall not be less than 3 units in either direction, nor shall it be greater than 14 400 units in either direction.
rule.test: top - bottom >= 3 && top - bottom <= 14400 && right - left >= 3 && right - left <= 14400

error.message: One of the bage boundaries is out of range (3-14400) in one of the directions
